interface.name: wl_vpc
interface.description: The video path control protocol provides a mechanism for the compositor and client to cooperate in the control of the decoding path used for video. The compositor can request the client to use a fully accelerated hardware path or a video-as-graphics path.

interface.name: wl_vpc_surface
interface.description: An interface that may be implemented by a wl_surface which is being used to present video which allows the compositor to control the decoding pathway being used for the video and to adjust its positioning.

request.name: set_geometry_with_crop
request.description: Set vpc surface geometry with the ability to crop the frame. The x, y, width, and heigth are values in screen coordinates that specify the rectangle to be textured with the video frame. The crop values, when divided by crop denom give the region of the frame to use as the texture.
